Class ChatSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.oosegroup5.fbanonchat.client.ChatSession

  • public abstract class ChatSession
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a chat session between two users.
    Author:
    johnlee

      abstract void addUsers(ChatUser user1, ChatUser user2)
      Adds two users to this chat session
      abstract void endChat()
      Ends the current chat session.
      abstract boolean revealUsers(boolean user1choice, boolean user2choice)
      When both users choose to reveal their identities, the chat session will be set to a revealed chat.

      Sends the messages between server and client
